name: Millet Porridge with Cranberries and Quince Fruit
description: This vegan millet porridge with cranberries and quince fruit is a healthy and delicious breakfast. It also makes a great dessert!
recipeIngredient: 2 cups almond milk or other plant-based milk
1  quince (about 7 oz) (If you can't find quince fruit, you could use 2 pears instead. )

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the millet together with the almond milk for about 15 minutes on a low heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the millet together with the almond milk for about 15 minutes on a low heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the apples and the quince into small pieces. Put them in a small pot together with the cranberries, add the water and the coconut sugar and cook for about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the apples and the quince into small pieces. Put them in a small pot together with the cranberries, add the water and the coconut sugar and cook for about 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the millet together with the cranberry-pear-quince sauce and top it off with cinnamon, coconut flakes and pomegranate seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve the millet together with the cranberry-pear-quince sauce and top it off with cinnamon, coconut flakes and pomegranate seeds.
